content: description the daisy day throw is in full bloom this blanket is worked up using the c2c method using bright and happy colors it s perfect for spring this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lionbrand 2 get all the yarn you need + the pdf digital download of the pattern you can even customize your yarn colors this pattern has a video tutorial on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/daisy-day-throw-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3gum2 3 https //youtu be/-qba-ueauxa
